Title: Relates to an individual's right to request a hearing regarding an unemployment insurance benefits claim
Summary: Relates to an individual's right to request a hearing regarding an unemployment insurance benefits claim; provides such a hearing can be requested if benefits or a written notice of determination denying their claim are not received within thirty days of providing all required information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to an individual's right to request a hearing regarding an unemployment insurance benefits claim
